entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
